statements: SELECT * FROM price_information;
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_information ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT price_id, product_name FROM price_information WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM price_information WHERE product_name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT product_name, price, last_updated FROM price_information ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_information WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_information WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM price_information WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM price_information
SELECT product_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM price_information GROUP BY product_name HAVING MAX(price) > 200
SELECT * FROM prices;
SELECT product_name, price FROM prices WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM prices WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_updates WHERE updated_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT product_name, updated_price, updated_at FROM prices p JOIN price_updates pu ON p.id = pu.price_id ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM prices INNER JOIN price_updates ON prices.id = price_updates.price_id WHERE prices.price > 100 ORDER BY prices.product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM prices WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM prices
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE product_name ILIKE 'apple%' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM prices GROUP BY product_name HAVING MAX(price) > 200
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM PriceInformation;
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails;
SELECT product_name, price FROM PriceInformation WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, description FROM ProductDetails ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT id, old_price, new_price, update_timestamp FROM PriceUpdateLogs WHERE old_price < new_price;
SELECT * FROM PriceInformation WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM PriceInformation ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM PriceInformation WHERE product_name LIKE '%digital%'
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails INNER JOIN PriceInformation ON ProductDetails.product_id = PriceInformation.id
SELECT product_name, old_price, new_price, update_timestamp FROM PriceUpdateLogs ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM PriceUpdates;
SELECT product_id, price FROM PriceUpdates WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_code FROM Procedures WHERE procedure_code LIKE 'P%';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products JOIN PriceUpdates ON Products.product_id = PriceUpdates.product_id WHERE PriceUpdates.price > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_code FROM Procedures ORDER BY procedure_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_updates WHERE updated_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM procedures ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, ph.old_price, ph.new_price FROM products p JOIN price_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id WHERE ph.updated_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ph.updated_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM price_updates WHERE new_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products;
